name: Triple Crush Arena
description:
Triple Crush Arena is similar to a Mahjong game but offers a whole new game play.
Game always need good logic and strategy to solve levels.

You can compete with other users for free
Includes tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes (where available).

◈ How to Play
- Just tap to place the tiles into the box.
- Three same tiles will be collected.
- When all tiles are collected, CLEAR!
- When there are 7 tiles in the box, out of moves and game is over!
- Tap three of the same tiles in a row to get a Streak for bonus points.
- Press the UNDO button to return the tile to its previous position (with some penalty).


If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at :
help@malanggames.com
